content:
Complete Blood Count (CBC) results:
- WBC: 7.5 x10^9/L (Normal: 4.5-11.0)
- RBC: 4.8 x10^12/L (Normal: 4.2-5.4)
- Hemoglobin: 14.2 g/dL (Normal: 13.5-17.5)
- Hematocrit: 42% (Normal: 38.8-50)
- Platelets: 250 x10^9/L (Normal: 150-450)
All values within normal range.

MRI of the lumbar spine shows:
- Mild degenerative disc disease at L4-L5
- No significant spinal stenosis
- No herniated discs
- Normal alignment of vertebral bodies
- No compression fractures

12-lead ECG interpretation:
- Normal sinus rhythm
- Heart rate: 72 bpm
- PR interval: 160ms
- QRS duration: 90ms
- QT interval: 380ms
- No ST segment changes
- No significant abnormalities detected
